Duty Free Info

What is the maximum Credit Card limit for ordinary customers?

AED 3600, One Credit Card per flight. The amount CANT be split on two cards.

What is the Credit Card limit for UAE Nationals and Residents?

AED 7500, the HHC will prompt to enter the customer's details i.e. Full Name on Passport, Passport No. and expiry date. Note: if using the manual Credit Card machine the same information must be printed on the back of the credit card slip that will be submitted to cashier.

Who may avail more than AED 7500 on Credit Cards for Duty Free purchase?

VIP, VVIP and iO. No limit and they may use multiple Credit Cards. This must be approved by Purser.

What do you write in the Approval Code box on the CC slip?

Nothing or 0000. NEVER write the 3 numbers on the back side of Credit Card. This will allow people taking money from the card.

How to manually enter the Credit Card details in the HHC when the Swipe option is not working?

After making the purchase, in the payments summary click on M menu select "CC Key In".

What to do when the HHC freezes?

Switch OFF and back ON. If not successful, remove the battery and re-insert and start the device. Never try to remove CF card.

Can we use the HHC for Onboard Upgrade?

No. This is only done by Purser through KiS and when Credit Card is used the manual CC machine will be used. Two forms must be completed and signed by the customer. The CC slip and the Universal Credit Card form. The CC slip for the money charged and the Universal form for the upgrade procedure and agreement.

Where is the credit card imprinters are loaded in B777 and A380?

The credit card imprinters are loaded in the following stowage positions:

  • B777 is loaded in JC doghouse, behind the last row of JC seats, left hand side.
  • A380 is loaded at 1M107. This location is at the CWS (Crew Work Station) under the seat doghouse.
  • Note: The Manual Credit Card Imprinter is remain on board (ROB) item and should be returned back to the original stowage after usage.
